title: Json schema for manifest.json file of Gira's logic node SDK

Assembly.description: The filename of the dll (including the file extension).

PackageName.description: Object with key-string pairs where the key is a country code and the value is the name of the node package in the respective language.

items.description: The filename of the dependent dll (including the file extension).

Version.description: The version of the logic nodes assembly the manifest.json describes. Shall be incremented.

Author.description: The holder of the copyright of the nodes this manifest.json describes.

DeveloperId.description: Has to match the field 'vendor' of your Gira developer license.

License.description: The licensing model of your nodes. Possible values: 'Free', 'Device' or 'Instance'. Default is Free (i.e. the License field is missing entirely).

PackageId.description: A unique identifier for the logic node package. Please generate a GUID using Visual Studio.

Type.description: Name of the node's class including the namespace.

Name.description: Object with key-string pairs where the key is a country code and the value is the name of the node in the respective language.

IsConverter.description: Defines if your node can be used to directly convert a value from another node's single output.

DefaultIcon.description: Relative path to the icon of the node.

HelpTooltip.description: Object with key-string pairs where the key is a country code and the value a tooltip in the respective language.

HelpFileReference.description: Describes where the helpfile for the logic node is located. Please consider the Logic SDK documentation for additional information.
